Html:
Hi, Developers,

I've been trying to create a horizontal DataGrid using the toolkit:DataGrid control.

By horizontal DataGrid, I means something just similar to multi-columns PropertyGrid, with property title in the left most column, all elements on the right as column

The way I found is to use LayoutTransform twice. The first time, rotate the whole DataGrid anti-clockwise 90 degree; the second step, rotate every cell clockwise 90 degree. It roughly works, but the text in each cell looks blurring.

Does anyone know any better solution to create horizontal DataGrid?

/Kai
